flawed_nl_solution:
The house is 2300 sq ft and we know the non-bedroom sections take up 1000 sq ft, so that leaves 2300-1000 = <<2300-1000=1300>>1300 sq ft for the bedrooms/bathrooms
So together the bedrooms are x + 0.25x = 12.5x in size.
So x = 1300 / 12.5 = <<1300/12.5=104>>104 sq ft
#### 104

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1.25, not 12.5. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
